name: AVAssetDownloadContentConfiguration
desc: A configuration object that contains variant qualifiers and media options.

items.name: var variantQualifiers: [AVAssetVariantQualifier]
items.desc: The variant qualifiers for this configuration.

items.desc: An object that represents an HTTP Live Streaming asset variant.

items.desc: The media selections of an asset that a task downloads.
